trans-unit.source: Represents an easing function that creates an animated bouncing effect.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en easing funksjon som oppretter en animerte hoppende effekt.

trans-unit.source: The following graph demonstrates BounceEase using different values of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>, where *f*(*t*) represents the animation progress and *t* represents time.
trans-unit.target: Følgende diagrammet viser BounceEase ved hjelp av ulike verdier for <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>, der *f*(*t*) representerer animasjonen fremdriften og *t* representerer klokkeslett.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: ![BounceEase EasingMode graphs.](~/add/media/bounceease-graph.png "BounceEase EasingMode graphs.")
trans-unit.target: ![BounceEase EasingMode diagrammer. ] (~/add/media/bounceease-graph.png "BounceEase EasingMode diagrammer.")

trans-unit.source: You can specify how many bounces occur using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounces%2A> property and specify how bouncy (how elastic the bounces are) using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounciness%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi hvor mange avvisninger skje ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounces%2A>egenskapen og angi hvordan bouncy (hvordan Elastisk avvisninger er) ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounciness%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounciness%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounces%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounciness%2A> property specifies the amplitude scaling of the next bounce.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounciness%2A>egenskapen angir amplitude skalering av den neste sprett.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounciness%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, a bounciness value of 2 doubles the amplitude of the next bounce during an ease in, and it halves the amplitude of the next bounce during an ease out.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel bounciness verdien 2 dobbelt så amplitude av den neste sprett under en enkel måte i, og den halveres amplitude av den neste sprett under en enkelt ut.

trans-unit.source: There are several other easing functions besides BounceEase which you can explore using the following Silverlight sample.
trans-unit.target: Det er flere easing funksjoner i tillegg til BounceEase som du kan utforske ved å bruke følgende Silverlight-utvalg.

trans-unit.source: [Run this sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=139798&sref=easing_functions_gallery) In addition to using the easing functions included in the run-time, you can create your own custom easing functions by inheriting from <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase>.
trans-unit.target: [Kjør dette eksemplet](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=139798&sref=easing_functions_gallery) i tillegg til ved hjelp av de easing funksjonene som er inkludert i kjøretid, kan du opprette egendefinerte easing funksjoner ved arving fra <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Object Element Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: ## XAML objektet elementet Bruk``` ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of bounces.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir hvor mange avvisninger.

trans-unit.source: This property does not include the final half-bounce.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen inneholder ikke den endelige halv-sprett.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[DP_ID_field_label](~/add/includes/dp-id-field-label-md.md)] ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[DP_ID_field_label](~/add/includes/dp-id-field-label-md.md)] ## XAML Attributtbruk ``` ```

trans-unit.source: The number of bounces.
trans-unit.target: Antall avvisninger.

trans-unit.source: The value must be greater than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: Verdien må være større enn eller lik null.

trans-unit.source: Negative values resolve to zero.
trans-unit.target: Negative verdier løse til null.

trans-unit.source: The default is 3.
trans-unit.target: Standard er 3.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounces*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounces*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounces*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies how bouncy the bounce animation is.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir hvordan bouncy sprett animasjonen er.

trans-unit.source: Low values of this property result in bounces with little lose of height between bounces (more bouncy) while high values result in dampened bounces (less bouncy).
trans-unit.target: Lav verdiene for denne egenskapen fører avvisninger med lite miste av høyde mellom avvisninger (mer bouncy) under høyeste verdier føre dempes avvisninger (mindre bouncy).

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[DP_ID_field_label](~/add/includes/dp-id-field-label-md.md)] ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[DP_ID_field_label](~/add/includes/dp-id-field-label-md.md)] ## XAML Attributtbruk ``` ```

trans-unit.source: The value that specifies how bouncy the bounce animation is.
trans-unit.target: Verdi som angir hvordan bouncy sprett animasjonen er.

trans-unit.source: This value must be positive.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien må være positiv.

trans-unit.source: The default value is `2`.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er `2`.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounciness*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounciness*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BounceEase.Bounciness*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"></xref> derived class.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Freezable"> </xref> avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: When creating a derived class, you must override this method.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppretter en avledet klasse, må du overstyre denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: Animation classes inherit indirectly from <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>.
trans-unit.target: Animasjon-klasser arve indirekte fra <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Because of this, you need to override the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.CreateInstanceCore%2A> method to construct a custom animation object.
trans-unit.target: Du vil overstyre derfor den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.CreateInstanceCore%2A>metode for å lage et egendefinert animasjon-objekt.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BackEase.CreateInstanceCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: The new instance.
trans-unit.target: Den nye forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Provides the logic portion of the easing function that you can override to produce the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode"></xref> mode of the custom easing function.
trans-unit.target: Gir logic-delen av funksjonen easing som du kan overstyre for å produsere det <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode"> </xref> modus for den egendefinerte easing funksjonen.

trans-unit.source: This method transforms normalized time to control the pace of an animation for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> case of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden overfører normalisert tid å kontroll over en animasjon for <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>tilfellet for <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>

trans-unit.source: You only have to specify your easing function for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> case because the implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.Ease%2A> method transforms `normalizedTime` for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> cases.
trans-unit.target: Du trenger bare å angi den easing funksjonen for det <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>tilfelle fordi implementeringen av den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.Ease%2A>metoden transformeringer `normalizedTime` for det <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>og <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>tilfeller.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.Ease%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode>

trans-unit.source: Normalized time (progress) of the animation.
trans-unit.target: Normalisert klokkeslettet (pågår) animasjonen.

trans-unit.source: A double that represents the transformed progress.
trans-unit.target: En dobbeltverdi som representerer transformert fremdriften.
